name: Jihosoft Mobile Recovery for iOS
short_description:
Deleted or lost important files on your iPhone, iPad or iPod touch? Jihosoft Mobile Recovery for iOS, the powerful iPhone/iPad/iPod data recovery tool will help to recover lost data, including contacts, messages, photos, videos, notes, and much more. 

Key Features of Jihosoft Mobile Recovery for iOS 
- Directly recover deleted data from iPhone/iPad/iPod touch 
- Retrieve lost data by extracting previous iTunes backup file 
- Recover data lost due to deletion, iOS upgrade, jailbreak, etc. 
- Fully support various iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch models

How Jihosoft Mobile Recovery for iOS will Help you
No matter how you lost your iOS data, wrong deletion, broken device, factory settings restore, iOS update crash or other reason, Jihosoft Mobile Recovery for iOS will scan and analyze the device, and restore your most important data. You can recover lost contacts, messages, photos, videos, notes, and more directly from iPhone/iPad/iPod touch or retrieve backups from iTunes.
summary: Great iOS data recovery to recover data from iPhone/iPad/iPod touch.
